params.amountToSwap: Amount of tokens needed to be swapped secondarily
params.putAmounts: Amounts of tokens put into the pool
params.returnedAmounts: Amounts of tokens returned to the user
params.swapSide: Flag indicating if swap token0 to token1 or vice versa

params.putAmounts: Amounts of tokens put into the pool
params.returnedAmounts: Amounts of tokens returned to the user

params.swapData: The swap data for the zap

params.tokenId: The ID of the token to zap out of

SimulationResult(address[],uint256[],uin.notice: Error thrown with the simulation result of a zap operation

TokenId(uint256).notice: Emitted when a new token ID is generated

ZapResult(address[],uint256[],uint256[],.notice: Emitted with the result of a zap operation

zapIn(((address,uint256)[],(address,uint.notice: Zaps in to a liquidity position

zapOut(uint256).notice: Zaps out of a liquidity position
